short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Robotizer streamlines lead generation by organizing leads into lists that easily integrate with your CRM, boosting sales efficiency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Robotizer is a SaaS extension designed to assist businesses in optimizing their lead generation and management processes. The extension allows users to identify leads directly from LinkedIn Sales Navigator and, with a single click on the Robotizer button, export their list. Users can then seamlessly organize and integrate lead information into their CRM systems. By streamlining these tasks, Robotizer helps businesses improve their sales efficiency and manage customer interactions more effectively. The extension adheres to best practices for data handling, ensuring that all lead information is securely processed and managed in compliance with industry standards.
